item.description:
@xX_CoDeR_AJ wrote:

It’s a Hybrid PVP based server and it does use that bank of yourscape shit. :s

if(rsInterface.interfaceType == 4) { rsInterface.disabledMessage = stream.readString().replaceAll("RuneScape", "Project-474"); rsInterface.enabledMessage = stream.readString();

item.title: Making levels actually level
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

I don’t know exactly which method it would be for your server, but if your server sets the name of the bank to something else (instead of “Bank of RuneScape” to “Bank of YourScape”), then you can copy that method, and there should be a number with it. Change that number to whatever the level numbers are in the interface (you should be able to use Lin’s interface maker to find the numbers.)

Read full topic

item.title: Making levels actually level
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“xX CoDeR AJ, post:1, topic:395919”]My Summoning stat is staying at level 1/1 and people are leveling in it, How would I make it go to level 2/2 than 3/3 and so on.
Hybrid PVP based[/quote]

I suppose you could just send the string to the interface (126 or 253 on the 317 I believe.)

Read full topic

item.title: Making levels actually level
item.dc:creator: @xX_CoDeR_AJ xX CoDeR AJ
item.description:
@xX_CoDeR_AJ wrote:

My Summoning stat is staying at level 1/1 and people are leveling in it, How would I make it go to level 2/2 than 3/3 and so on.
Hybrid PVP based

[code]skillInterface(19746, 255);
//skillInterface(19747, 51);
//skillInterface(19748, 50);
skillInterface(19749, 52);
addText(29801, “1”, wid, 0, 0xFFEE33); //Summoning
addText(29800, “1”, wid, 0, 0xFFEE33); //Hunter

	AddInterfaceButton(19747, 51, 27700, "Interfaces/Skill/Skill", 62, 32, "View @or1@Hunter @whi@guide", 1);
	AddInterfaceButton(19748, 50, 27701, "Interfaces/Skill/Skill", 62, 32, "View @or1@Summoning @whi@guide", 1);
	/*[/code]
